languages.text: {n}Оставшиеся в зале смотрят на вас, замерев в ожидании. Финальный вердикт. Ваши следующие слова решат судьбу не только Адептус Арбитес, но и всего правосудия в Просторе Коронус.{/n}

{n}The rest of the room stands still, all eyes turned to you. The final verdict. What you say next will decide the fate of not just the Adeptus Arbites, but of justice in the Koronus Expanse as a whole.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Оставшиеся в зале смотрят на вас, замерев в ожидании. Финальный вердикт. Ваши следующие слова решат судьбу не только Адептус Арбитес, но и всего правосудия в Просторе Коронус.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The rest of the room stands still, their eyes turned to you. The final verdict. What you say next will decide the fate of not just the Adeptus Arbites, but of justice in the Koronus Expanse as a whole.{/n}

{n}The rest of the room stands still, their eyes turned to you. The final verdict. What you say next will decide the fate of not just the Adeptus Arbites, but of justice in the Koronus Expanse as a whole.{/n}

{n}The rest of the room stands still, all eyes turned to you. The final verdict. What you say next will decide the fate of not just the Adeptus Arbites, but of justice in the Koronus Expanse as a whole.{/n}

{n}The rest of the room stands still, all eyes turned to you. The final verdict. What you say next will decide the fate of not just the Adeptus Arbites, but of justice in the Koronus Expanse as a whole.{/n}

{n}The rest of the room stands still, all eyes turned to you. The final verdict. What you say next will decide the fate of not just the Adeptus Arbites, but of justice in the Koronus Expanse as a whole.{/n}

{n}The rest of the room stands still, all eyes turned to you. The final verdict. What you say next will decide the fate of not just the Adeptus Arbites, but of justice in the Koronus Expanse as a whole.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Rest des Saals steht regungslos da. Alle Augen sind auf dich gerichtet. Das abschließende Urteil. Was du als Nächstes sagst, wird das Schicksal des Adeptus Arbites und der gesamten Justiz der Koronus-Ausdehnung besiegeln.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rest of the room stands still, all eyes turned to you. The final verdict. What you say next will decide the fate of not just the Adeptus Arbites, but of justice in the Koronus Expanse as a whole.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Rest des Saals steht regungslos da. Alle Augen sind auf dich gerichtet. Das abschließende Urteil. Was du als Nächstes sagst, wird das Schicksal des Adeptus Arbites und der gesamten Justiz der Koronus-Ausdehnung besiegeln.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les autres personnes présentes se figent, leurs regards braqués sur vous. Le moment de l'ultime verdict est venu. Votre décision déterminera non seulement le sort de l'Adeptus Arbites, mais aussi celui de la justice dans toutes les Étendues de Koronus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rest of the room stands still, all eyes turned to you. The final verdict. What you say next will decide the fate of not just the Adeptus Arbites, but of justice in the Koronus Expanse as a whole.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les autres personnes présentes se figent, leurs regards braqués sur vous. Le moment de l'ultime verdict est venu. Votre décision déterminera non seulement le sort de l'Adeptus Arbites, mais aussi celui de la justice dans toutes les Étendues de Koronus.{/n}

languages.text: {n}房间里剩下的人呆立不动，所有人的目光都转向了你，等待着最后的判决。你接下来的话语，不仅会决定法务部的命运，还会决定整个科罗努斯扩区的正义何去何从。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rest of the room stands still, all eyes turned to you. The final verdict. What you say next will decide the fate of not just the Adeptus Arbites, but of justice in the Koronus Expanse as a whole.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}房间里剩下的人呆立不动，所有人的目光都转向了你，等待着最后的判决。你接下来的话语，不仅会决定法务部的命运，还会决定整个科罗努斯扩区的正义何去何从。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El resto de la sala permanece inmóvil y sientes que todas las miradas se clavan en ti. El veredicto final. Tus próximas palabras no solo decidirán el destino del Adeptus Arbites, sino de la justicia en toda la Extensión de Koronus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rest of the room stands still, all eyes turned to you. The final verdict. What you say next will decide the fate of not just the Adeptus Arbites, but of justice in the Koronus Expanse as a whole.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El resto de la sala permanece inmóvil y sientes que todas las miradas se clavan en ti. El veredicto final. Tus próximas palabras no solo decidirán el destino del Adeptus Arbites, sino de la justicia en toda la Extensión de Koronus.{/n}

languages.text: {n}部屋の残りの部分は静まり返り、すべての視線があなたに向けられる。最終判決だ。あなたが次に何を言うかによって、高等裁定局だけでなく、コロヌス・エクスパンス全体の正義の運命が決まる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rest of the room stands still, all eyes turned to you. The final verdict. What you say next will decide the fate of not just the Adeptus Arbites, but of justice in the Koronus Expanse as a whole.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}部屋の残りの部分は静まり返り、すべての視線があなたに向けられる。最終判決だ。あなたが次に何を言うかによって、高等裁定局だけでなく、コロヌス・エクスパンス全体の正義の運命が決まる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Odadaki diğer kişiler, kaskatı kesilmiş hâlde gözlerini sana çeviriyor. Nihai karar. Bundan sonra ağzından çıkan her hece; yalnızca Adeptus Arbites'in değil, tüm Koronus Enginliği'ndeki adaletin kaderini belirleyecek.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rest of the room stands still, all eyes turned to you. The final verdict. What you say next will decide the fate of not just the Adeptus Arbites, but of justice in the Koronus Expanse as a whole.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Odadaki diğer kişiler kaskatı kesilmiş hâlde gözlerini sana çevirmiş. Nihai karar. Bundan sonra ağzından çıkan her hece, yalnızca Adeptus Arbites'in değil, tüm Koronus Enginliği'ndeki adaletin kaderini belirleyecektir.{/n}
